scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,green "npm run dev --workspace @medledger/web" "npm run dev --workspace @medledger/api"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @medledger/api && npm run build --workspace @medledger/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @medledger/api && npm run typecheck --workspace @medledger/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @medledger/api && npm run lint --workspace @medledger/web
